features: Replenishing Cocoa Butter with Lanolin to soothe and soften dry, irritated skin
Helps reduce the appearance of dry skin wrinkles, lines and crow's feet
Restores and maintains skin's moisture balance and is excellent for overexposed skin
After just a few uses your skin will feel softer, smoother and more comfortable
body.description: Queen Helene has been a leader in quality beauty products for professional and personal use since 1930. Our products are inspired by nature’s finest ingredients because they are safer, and often more effective, than harsh chemicals and unnecessary additives. We use natural elements like cocoa butter that are rich with vitamins and natural emollient properties to moisturize, soften and nurture your skin and hair. We use pomegranate oil for its antioxidant protection against the skin-aging effects of the environment and essential oils to help relax tired muscles and ease tension. Many of our products take advantage of the unique qualities of nature’s finest ingredients to keep you looking your best. For over 80 years, our commitment to excellence has made many of our products among the leaders in the personal care category, and we are proud to continue our dedication to providing the most effective products your body needs from head to toe.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Queen Helene Cocoa Butter Hand & Body Lotion This luxuriously rich, non-greasy crème blends cocoa butter and lanolin to quench and relieve moisture-starved skin. Protects from dryness caused by over-exposure; helps diminish the appearance of wrinkles; and soothes discomforts of stretched skin during and after pregnancy.

About us We use natural elements like cocoa butter that are rich with vitamins and natural emollient properties to moisturize, soften and nurture your skin and hair. We use pomegranate oil for its antioxidant protection against the skin-aging effects of environment and essential oils to help relax tired muscles and ease tension. Many of our products take advantage of the unique qualities of nature’s finest ingredients to keep you looking your best.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Queen Helene Cocoa Butter Hand and Body Lotion
reviews.reviewText: As someone who typically shies away from using lotion due to its heavy and greasy feel, I was initially hesitant to try the Queen Helene Cocoa Butter Hand and Body Lotion. However, after ordering a large bottle for both my husband and me, I can confidently say that I am pleasantly surprised by how much I love it. One of the first things that struck me about this lotion is its delightful scent. With every application, I feel like I've been transported to a serene beach setting, enveloped in the comforting aroma of cocoa butter. It adds a touch of luxury to my skincare routine and leaves me feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. What truly sets this lotion apart for me is its lightweight texture. Unlike other lotions I've tried in the past, this one absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving behind any greasy residue. I appreciate how effortlessly it spreads and how it doesn't weigh down my skin, allowing me to go about my day comfortably. Additionally, I've noticed that the Queen Helene Cocoa Butter Hand and Body Lotion provides ample hydration without feeling heavy or cloying. It leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and moisturized, without the need for constant reapplication throughout the day.I would highly recommend this lotion, especially for those with mature skin. Its lightweight, non-greasy formula makes it a joy to use, and the beach-like scent adds a delightful touch to the skincare experience. Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with the Queen Helene Cocoa Butter Hand and Body Lotion and plan to continue incorporating it into my daily routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the scent. Works great, and leaves my skin very soft. The only thing that I don't like is that is very watery. But works for my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry skin!
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Great price! You have to like the scent of coco butter, which I do, but it doesn't last so that is good for those that don't care for the scent. I love this lotion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the smell and texture of this lotion. It is light weight on the skin and dries quickly. 4 stars because it does contain number dyes. If dyes are not something you avoid then I highly recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I Love This
reviews.reviewText: This has been a staple in my bathroom. It’s huge! It’s inexpensive! It smells nice! It works! I like it just as well as another brand,Palmers, and it’s much easier for your wallet to handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the price
reviews.reviewText: Unlike other body lotions, this lotion doesn't have a weird smell and it isn't runny. It's thick which means a little goes a long way. Nice clean scent. Absorbs very quickly. I'll most definitely be buying more of this brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It Smells So good and makes your Skin feel so Soft!!! Plus for the price you get a huge bottle of it too. I am very happy!!! Thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little thin and why Red dye 40??
reviews.reviewText: There were so many great reviews that I wanted to try something new that is a good value and still has cocoa butter near the top of the list of ingredients. Other brands like Vaseline, Nivea, and other stores' brand list coconut and shea before cocoa extracts and smell like additives. I typically buy Palmers, and grew up using Palmers.Queen Helene has a pretty short ingredient list but there are 3 color dyes added including Red 40 - which is proven to cause migraines, hyperactivity, and behavioral changes like irritability and depression. Other countries require warning labels on products with Red 40! Also called: Red 40 Lake, FD&C Red No. 40, *Red 40 Aluminum Lake* <- listed in ingredients.This lotion is not as thick as other cocoa butter lotions I have tried so I don't feel like it is as hydrating but would be useful in warmer months to cut down on that sticky feeling. The smell is alright too.I would probably commit to a switch if they removed the red dye 40, which is unnecessary. I don't care what color the lotion is w/o dyes, if the ingredients and quality are good it doesn't matter.
My favourite non greasy lotion. Hard to find though.
Just like I remember it, just smaller bottles, which is perfect 👌
Habe es früher schon immer benutzt , und bin immer noch begeistert
Was soll ich sagen, die Lotion riecht immernoch genauso und ich vertrage sie gut. Allerdings habe ich das Gefühl, daß sie sehr viel flüssiger geworden ist. Egal, sie erfüllt ihren Zweck.
